title: (x) The Beatles typeface, used for Across the Universe poster - hand drawn {Stephen}
content:
Hey all -

Anybody know what font is used here? It was a Beatles logo, now used for title of Across the Universe...

[http://www.ioncinema.com/images/upload/3792poster.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090602072034/http:/www.ioncinema.com/images/upload/3792poster.jpg "http://www.ioncinema.com/images/upload/3792poster.jpg")

Thanks!
author: macgee

comments.content: See a shadowed version of the logo (the one Ringo Starr had on his drumkit) [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20090602072034/http:/www.fab4collectibles.com/BeatlesLogoLARGEblack.jpg).

The logo was probably hand drawn, as was the movie poster. You might like [Strayhorn](http://web.archive.org/web/20090602072034/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/strayhorn_regular_sc_osf/?sample_text=Across%20The%20Universe&sample_size=48&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
The poster probably uses the Bootle font which is based on The Beatles logo. Do a google search for it.
